page.title: 10BEACHCOMBERS
page.content: On our visit to the Broadstone shore we gathered a great variety of shells which we later identified as :- Common whelk,Razor shell,Carpet shell,Limpet shell,Mussel,Cockles,Common Saddle Oyster,Periwinkles,Screw shell,Ormers,Tower shells,Otter shells,Queen scallop,Hunchback Scallop,and also a type of coral. We also found a Mermaid's purse (egg-case of dog-fish) and also the egg case of the common whelk.We found the body shell of a crab,the shell of a snail, a sea sponge and a pine cone.We also indentified the wild flowers as; Bluebells,Red Campion,Marsh Marigold, Wild Garlic,Horse's tail,Water Crowfoot,Cleavers,Sea Sandwort, Buttercups,Prickly Saltwort,Shepherd's Purse,Nettles,Cotton-Grass, Shrubby Seablite and Ragwort.
